code: import i18n from'i18next';import Backend from'i18next-http-backend';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';i18n.use(Backend).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({fallbackLng:'ru',debug:true,detection:{order:['queryString','cookie'],cache:['cookie']},interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
